public class TopLevelTransaction
extends AtomicTransaction

If nested top-level transaction, save current context for resumption later.

begin in class AtomicTransaction
Following copied from class: com.arjuna.CosTransactions.ArjunaOTS.AtomicTransaction
Throws:
SubtransactionsUnavailable - if subtransactions have been disabled, and the invoking thread already has a transaction associated with it.
org.omg.CORBA.INVALID_TRANSACTION - if the transaction has already begun or has completed.
